SAP Hybris | Your New Digital Transformation Companion
Ultimate E-Commerce Boosting Solution
As the world of commerce continues to change, It has made the lives of people easier than ever before, and has had a high-powered impact on people from around the globe. Ecommerce has become a platform that escalates business transactions in the market and helps businesses to stand out at a next level.
Acting as a marvellous feat, SAP has introduced a simplified and an interactive way to broaden your business by attracting customers in more significant ways. SAP Hybris Cloud is a well qualified solution for your business transactions, and Ecommerce integration with SAP Hybris on Premises solution or any of the external systems such as ERP, CRM, OMS etc for a highly personalized customer experience.
Why SAP Hybris?
What We Are!!
Miracle Software Systems, Inc. is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, Michigan. With over 20 years of experience and 2000 employees globally, it has been helping numerous Fortune 1000 customers achieve their business goals. Miracle's expertise spans across Application Development and Management, Cloud Infrastructure and Applications, Hybrid Integration, ERP Development and Support, and Information Management.
Omni Channel Commerce Solution Suite
SAP Hybris' Omni-Channel Commerce helps you build a robust relationship with your customers by making yourself virtually available to them at anyplace. It guides you through better ways to extend your business anyplace, anytime, and on any device, letting you maintain an integrated commerce and order management based platform that can manage customer lifecycle.
